DOC.criteria: Healthy male assess health lifestyle questionnaire , physical examination result prestudy laboratory test Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≤ 33 kg/m2 Normal Dutch eat habit , include use breakfast Willing use supplement contain Bvitamins , lecithin , choline ( derivative ) betaine oral information session end study Voluntary participation Having give write informed consent Willing comply study procedure , include dietary restriction Willing accept use nameless data , include publication , confidential use storage data Willing accept disclosure financial benefit participation study authority concern Participation clinical trial include blood sample and/or administration product 90 day Day 01 study Participation noninvasive clinical trial 30 day Day 01 study Having history medical surgical event may significantly affect study outcome , include cardiovascular disease hypertension Use medication know interfere homocysteine metabolism Plasma total homocysteine concentration > 26 µmol/L Plasma vitamin B6 concentration ≤ 15 nmol/L Serum vitamin B12 concentration < 138 pmol/L Serum folic acid concentration < 5.0 nmol/L Alcohol consumption > 28 units/week Reported unexplained weight loss gain > 2 kg month prior prestudy screen Reported slimming medically prescribe diet Reported food allergy Reported vegan macrobiotic Use Bvitamin supplement , lecithin , supplement contain choline ( derivative ) betaine , weekly < 1 month screen Recent blood plasma donation ( < 1 month prior start study ) Not willing stop blood plasma donation study Personnel TNO Nutrition Food Research , partner relative first second remove Not general practitioner Not willing accept informationtransfer concern participation study , information regard his/her health , like laboratory result , finding anamnesis physical examination eventual adverse event general practitioner
